food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Think of a yummy fruit monkeys enjoy.
💛 My skin is the color of the sun.
🥣 You can slice me into your cereal.

food.question: I am white and good to drink. Cows give me to us. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal.
🥛 I make your bones strong.
☕ You can put me in your coffee.

food.question: I am round and orange and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 I'm a favorite snack for rabbits.
🥕 I'm a root vegetable.
👁️ I'm good for your eyes.

food.question: I am small and green and grow in a pod. You can eat me as a snack or with dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in a shell.
🟢 I'm a vegetable that is the color of grass.
🍲 You can eat me in soup.

food.question: I am a sweet treat. I am cold and you eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I'm a dessert that melts in the sun.
🥄 You eat me in a cone or a cup.
😋 I come in many different flavors.

food.question: I am red and juicy. I grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate a poisonous one.
🌳 I grow on a tree and can be many colors.
🥧 You can make pie with me.

food.question: I am a bread, you put things in me to make a lunch. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.
🥖 You can put peanut butter and jelly on me.
🍞 I can be white or brown.

food.question: I am round and flat. I am made of dough and baked in an oven. You can put cheese and tomato sauce on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often cut into slices.
🇮🇹 I am a popular food from Italy.
🔥 I am baked at a hot temperature.

food.question: I am made from fruit, but I'm not a fruit. I'm sweet and spreadable and often eaten with toast. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am made from crushed fruit.
🍞 People like to eat me on their toast.
🍯 I can be strawberry, grape, or orange flavored.

food.question: I am a long yellow food made from potatoes. I am often served with ketchup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I'm often sold at fast food restaurants
🥔 I start as a potato.
🧂 They are often salty

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and say 'blub blub'. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am small and colorful
💦 I need water to live
🫧 I have fins and a tail

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and boats float on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I am very, very wide
🌊 I have waves
🐳 Animals live in me

ocean.question: I live in a shell and walk very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I carry my home on my back
🥬 I like to eat seaweed
👋 I leave a slimy trail

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change colors
💦 I squirt ink when I'm scared
💡 I am very smart

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth! Be careful swimming near me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many rows of teeth
🦈 I am a predator
🎬 You can see me in Jaws movies

ocean.question: I am a very large whale that sings songs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am the biggest singer in the ocean.
🎵 I can sing a very low song.
🐋 My song helps me find my friends.

ocean.question: I’m a colourful creature, shaped like a star, living under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I have five arms.
🖐️ I live on the ocean floor
🌈 I come in lots of colors.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell, pinch with my claws, and walk sideways on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I scuttle along the beach.
🍎 Some people eat me as a treat.
🐚 I can sometimes be found in tide pools.

ocean.question: I am long and slithery and live in the ocean. I am not a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐉 I live in the water.
🐟 Some are dangerous and some are not.
🔦 Some types have lights on them.

ocean.question: I am a baby sea turtle's first big challenge. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ It happens right after they hatch on the beach.
🌊 It's a race against the waves.
🐦 Birds and crabs want to eat them while they do it.
